document.full_text: the definitive edition of the economist friedrich a. hayek's monumental work, which argues that no central government can know enough to organize society as efficiently as the market.
document.title: friedrich a. hayek, big-government skeptic
lines_and_colors: the definitive edition of the economist friedrich a. hayek's monumental work, which argues that no central government can know enough to organize society as efficiently as the market.
